import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ViewportScroller } from '@angular/common'; @Component({ selector: 'app-landing-page', templateUrl: './landing-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./landing-page.component.css'] }) export class LandingPageComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private viewPortScroller: ViewportScroller) { } ngOnInit(): void { } public onClick(elementId: string): void{ this.viewPortScroller.scrollToAnchor(elementId); } }

WELCOME TO

CONVERGENCE IT SOLUTIONS


Empowering those who lead the digital transformation to bring their business to the next level and turn it into a competitive advantage and technology

Why Choose Us

Quality

We deliver our services with the best quality. We have a team of experts who give reliable solutions for your business.

Support

We provide a quick technical support and consultancy on the services we deliver. We are just one call away.

Delivery

We deliver our projects on-time handled by our well trained project managers.

Company highlights

Founded in 2018 aiming to provide distinctive, specialized, and high-quality turnkey solutions

Employees with hands-on experience and certifications

Provides Multi-vendor IT solutions and end to end services

15

Working in partnership with the best vendors in the industry

10

Enterprises and organizations working with us serving their needs

10

Completed projects fulfilling the necessary quality standards

Would you like to start a project with us?

Our Services


Data Center Facility

  • Computing, Storage and OS, Backup and Recovery
  • Serve and Desktop virtualization, Converged Infrastructure
  • Application Delivery and Load Balancing, Hyper-Convergence
  • Cloud Automation and Orchestration, On-perm & public cloud

Cloud managed services

  • Consultancy
  • Quality assurance
  • Managed Software ERP
  • Managed Security
  • Technical Support Services
  • VISP Services

Enterprise IT Infrastructure

  • Wireless LAN
  • WAN Optimization
  • Collaboration
  • Infrastructure

Network & Computer Security

  • Infrastructure Security
  • Endpoint Security
  • Datacenter Security
  • Security Operations

Software & System solutions

  • Internet of Things (IoT) applications
  • Full ERP Solution
  • Big Data and Analytics solutions
  • Anti Money Laundry
  • Smart Office Solution

Smart Facility

  • Datacenter Power System
  • Smart Buildings
  • Smart Classroom & Meeting Rooms
  • Operation Centers (NOC/SOC)

Clients

We work closely with a wide range of clients from different sectors and regions across the public sector and the private sector.

Partners

We work in partnership with the best vendors in the industry.
